title: Feedback-Driven Diagnostic Correction Skill Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of Basic Social Science Methodology and Familiarity with Core Statistical Concepts
context.additional_context: Online course for strengthening socio-scientific analytical skills. Provides an environment where students independently analyze complex cases and iteratively receive feedback

learning_goals: Learners can align their diagnostic confidence with objective accuracy at over 80% accuracy
Learners can reduce self-assessment bias by 20% or more through 12 or more complex case studies
Learners can systematically analyze and improve errors occurring in the diagnostic process using feedback mechanisms
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
